entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 10:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
